comments:
If you perform the QuickFix command anywhere in a JSP, you get an error dialog 
with the following:

Error Executing Command
"Quick Fix" did not complete normally.  Please see the log for more information

Reason:
java.lang.NullPointerException

And the following is in the log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-07-26 14:53:35.725
!MESSAGE "Quick Fix" did not complete normally.  Please see the log for more 
information.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-07-26 14:53:35.725
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.StructuredTextViewer.doOperation
(StructuredTextViewer.java:511)

(ActionHandler.java:182)

*** Bug 105541 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Amy, will you please triage these to determine proper owner (if you can't fix,
that is).

Nitin, I think I just saw in CVS History that you've already checked in a fix 
for this.

Updated StructuredTextViewer.doOperation to make sure the correction assistant
exists and is installed before we call it.
marking some obvious ones as verified on Amy's behalf.
